price: No indeed! On that Day they will be barred from seeing their Lord[4].
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
footnotes: [4] As a punishment, since the believers will see Him.
